name: Pongpongpongpong
description:
Made for GBJam 2016, with Godot Game Engine

Controls

  • Player 1
    • W & S = Move up and down
    • A & D = Rotate
  • Player 2
    • J & L = Move left and right
    • I & K = Rotate
  • Player 3
    • Up & down arrow keys = Move up and down
    • Left & right arrow keys = Rotate
  • Player 4
    • 4 & 6 = Move left and right
    • 8 & 5 = Rotate
  • Reset game = Space
  • Quit game = ESC
